Control Name: ACQUISITION PROCESS | USE OF APPROVED PIV PRODUCTS
Control Statement: The organization employs only information technology products on the FIPS 201-approved products list for Personal Identity Verification (PIV) capability implemented within organizational information systems.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: IA-2; IA-8.
